π⁻π⁰$\leftrightarrow$ρ⁻	0.9600221075902727	0.9627855563743553
π⁻π⁺$\leftrightarrow$ρ⁰	1.0816138540899043	1.0771923360353721
π⁰π⁺$\leftrightarrow$ρ⁺	0.9561532792925571	0.9622328666175387
π⁻π⁺$\leftrightarrow$σ	0.9931372549019608	0.9950980392156863
2$\times$(π⁰π⁰$\leftrightarrow$σ)	1.003921568627451	1.007843137254902
